verses.name: Mark 6:11
verses.text: And whosoever shall not receive you, nor hear you, when ye depart thence, shake off the dust under your feet for a testimony against them. Verily I say unto you, It shall be more tolerable for Sodom and Gomorrha in the day of judgment, than for that city.

verses.name: Mark 6:12
verses.text: And they went out, and preached that men should repent.

verses.name: Mark 6:13
verses.text: And they cast out many devils, and anointed with oil many that were sick, and healed them.
